name: ffi::c_str::<impl borrow::ToOwned for core::ffi::CStr>::to_owned

core::ffi::CStr::to_bytes_with_nul.doc:
Converts this C string to a byte slice containing the trailing 0 byte.

 This function is the equivalent of [`CStr::to_bytes`] except that it
 will retain the trailing nul terminator instead of chopping it off.

 > **Note**: This method is currently implemented as a 0-cost cast, but
 > it is planned to alter its definition in the future to perform the
 > length calculation whenever this method is called.

 # Examples

 ```
 assert_eq!(c"foo".to_bytes_with_nul(), b"foo\0");
 ```

core::convert::Into::into.doc: Converts this type into the (usually inferred) input type.
